title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 646-3.2 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 646-3.2 - Applicability

State Regulations
(a) This Subpart shall
apply to the discharge of sewage and the design, construction, operation, and
maintenance of Wastewater Treatment Systems located in the Lake George
basin; (b) The requirements of this

Subpart are in addition to, and not in lieu of, the requirements for wastewater
treatment systems set forth in local codes, New York State Public Health Law, the

Environmental Conservation Law (ECL), and implementing regulations. Wherever a
conflict exists between this Subpart and any local or State laws or regulations, the
more restrictive provision shall apply. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
646-3.2

Adopted

New

York State Register April 5, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 14, eff. 4/5/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
